item.title: CVE-2023-2315|2024-08-02T06:19:14.718Z -- opencart -- opencart
item.description: Path Traversal in OpenCart versions 4.0.0.0 to 4.0.2.2 allows an authenticated user with access/modify privilege on the Log component to empty out arbitrary files on the server
